Description: Avail. Sept. 1st-Fort Hill--Fully-furnished Luxury Single Family 3 bedrooms, 1.5 bath. Features newly renovated kitchen and baths, hardwood floors, central heat + air, private entrance, and patio, off-street parking, and in-unit laundry, additional living space in finished basement. Tons of area amenities, restaurants, shopping, public transit, laundry, etc. Minutes to NEU, MCPHS, Longwood, Wentworth, BMC, Nubian Sq., Roxbury Crossing, Jackson Sq., and Ruggles Station.
